data.title: Great surprise find
data.text: We happened upon this place totally by accident, great casual food, high quality and big portions. Customer service was spot on and they offered us samples of anything that caught our eye. Cant wait to go back but next time we will split a sandwich and get an extra side (so good)

data.title: A
data.text: Love their chicken and side dishes there home made salad dressing is delicious great  for a catered affair any size causal affair

data.title: How is this place so low rated unless you have prior knowledge or GPS?
data.text:
SERIOUSLY . This is the hole in the wall place in a strip mall that's invisible from a main road,but one that you would find on Food TV's DDD Show. When I first saw it this trip I KNEW , (but couldn't remember why,that I needed to eat HERE)! The last time I was in Boca was 5yrs ago.
 Inside is modest but very clean.  The staff appears to be college age, ( but more attentive than those in TLH). They greet you as you walk in (and label the tip jar as "The College Fund").
  The lead menu item BBQ  chicken ( which they are up front about) is baked chicken covered with BBQ sauce). But the real GEM is the meatloaf and the homemade sides! I got the lunch SPL which was a 1/2 meatloaf sandwich and 1 side for $5 ,(in this case fresh fruit , horseradish mash or fresh green beens and 2 others I can't remember)., The bread on the sandwich was really fresh (moist),the meat loaf wasn't load with too much Bell Pepper.
  If you are Glades Blvd, look to the doth of Brewzaai on the parallel stew.

data.title: Great fresh food every time!
data.text: I love love love love C.R. chicks. Always in the mood to go there. Service is always great and food is quick and easy. Although I get the chicken breast sandwich every time, all of their menu items are fresh and tastes amazing!

data.title: great fresh food
data.text: great rotissaire chicken served there fresh. very popular lunch restaurant for business and fau students.

data.title: Simple, yet delicious.
data.text: Their food is very good, it's simple and delicious and has great flavor. The staff is very friendly and always willing to give advice on what to try.

data.title: They Do Chicken Right
data.text: Stopped by last night. I had the best grilled chicken breast sandwich ever! Homemade bread, lettuce ,tomato and mayo, Incredible pasta dish with chicken too in a smoky tomato sauce. Mac and cheese was off the hook, Very reasonable and large portions!

data.title: Great at what it does
data.text:
This place is great at what it does. The rotisserie chicken is superb, being most, tender and tasty.

We tried it for lunch and enjoyed half a chicken each, one with carrots and beans, the other with cole slaw and cucumber.  At these prices this is a true bargain for a terrific meal.

Of course, the menu is limited. Of course, the place does not have the decor or ambience of a fine dining outlet. But for what it is aiming at, which seems to be specialist, honest to goodness top of the range chicken with sensible accompaniments, it is way ahead of other places.

A clear Excellent

data.title: Best Chicken in Boca!
data.text: I travel to Boca area often and every time I come to town I stop in to CR Chick's for one of their healthy chicken dishes. They cook the rotisserie chicken  right out where you can see it when you walk in and they flavor is great! I am also hooked on their chicken salad on lettuce, which is a great healthy meal with fresh vegtables. I will continue to come here every time I am in town.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Fast, friendly and a healthy alternative to quick and easy dining. The horseradish mashed potatoes are great and so are the carrots. It's like eating a great home cooked meal.

data.title: LOVE!!
data.text: This food was amazing! the flavors were just SO spot on. Oh my gosh. Please open a restaurant in Minnesota, this was seriously the best meal I had in Florida. The cole slaw and mashed potatoes were phenomenal. I wish I could have this meal flown to me, lol It was SO cheap too! Under $15 to feed me and my husband and my 7 year old daughter. The staff was great, knew everything about everything they had. It felt like home in Florida for us. Keep up the great work guys!

data.title: I will return
data.text: I will definitely return and try their other offerings. Could some things be done differently, of course, but the chicken was out of this world. I can't wait to try the rest. They need a bigger sign. Bathrooms should be spotless, not so so. Great Staff! I shall return.

data.title: The best chicken ever
data.text: My family and I regularly takeout from this restaurant. The staff is amazingly friendly. The food is always fresh and delicious. Even the meatloaf is good. My wife loves the gazpacho and I love the smashed potatoes. Don't forget to get a side of macaroni and cheese and a cookie or two.

data.title: Good Chicken
data.text: Chicken is very good, Staff is very accommodating, Garlic smashed potatoes are delicious, This was a take-out for me and they skinned and de boned the chicken for me , they also have well-done and no-salt added.

data.title: Local chicken restaurant
data.text: C.R. Chicks is a very pleasant , small roasted chicken restaurant.  The ambiance is very low key.  The staff was very accommodating allowing me to make adjustments to the basic offerings.  Food was very good (except the string beens which were very overdone and soggy).  They also offer a Gluten free menu!

data.title: We recommend
data.text:
The only place in US I had real Noodle Chicken Soup, made of real chicken meat. It was excellent.
The Black Bean Soup was very good.
The 1/4 Grilled Chicken was very good.
The Green Beans were very good.
The Potato Pancake was very good.
A pleasant place, clean, well kept, friendly service, clean restrooms, nice and bright design.
